title: [A Winding Path]
description: Thick haon bushes, the silvery blue bark glowing in the summer sunlight, flank a pair of wrought iron gates.  Several nosegays of white flowers are tied to the ironwork with multicolored ribbons.  A wooden sign, painted gray and edged in deep blue, is affixed to one gate.

Thick haon bushes, the silvery blue bark barely visible in the light spilling from several nearby glaesine lanterns, flank a pair of wrought iron gates.  Several nosegays of white flowers are tied to the ironwork with multicolored ribbons.  A wooden sign, painted gray and edged in deep blue, is affixed to one gate.
